Author: mormigil
Title: [ANN][VCN] Ventured Tokensale | August 25th
Body: http://i.imgur.com/iVwXvTF.png  The Ventured Network is using data science on the Ethereum Blockchain to match people with work.  We are building an application to simplify the process of creating projects on Ethereum. The application will help a project find funding, workers, and insights. This will be accomplished through a central project management system and a smart matchmaking system for people to find interesting Ethereum projects. Once matched to projects smart work contracts will be used to negotiate, amend, and reconcile payments between projects and workers.  A lack of trust and general social equity in the gig economy means that a lot of work that could be given to contractors is instead kept within companies. We believe this missing work could be unlocked by creating smart work contracts that create accountability on the blockchain. For more specific information regarding our research and plan for improving contract work check out our whitepaper.  Partnerships: We are proud to be recently announced as a member of EEA and are currently exploring a partnership with IBM. Author: mormigil
Title: [ANN][VCN] Ventured Tokensale | August 25th
Body: We are in talks for escrow with tokenmarket.net. There will be a pre-sale 72 hours before the start of the ICO with a 10% early-bird bonus and the token will be distributed within one week after the end of the token sale.
